column6: CIVIL WAR TIE-IN!  Caught in the throes of the Civil War that's ripping apart the super hero community, Spider-Man contemplates a move that will mean new friends and new foes.  In a conflict of this magnitude, three is no middle ground -- Peter Parker's move will cast him as either George Washington...or Benedict Arnold.
column8: | penciller (cover):Ron Garney | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold
